item.title: Sammy is ABC7’s Pet of the Week
item.description: Sammy's former owner had to give him up because of health issues.

item.title: Free Manatee County veterans ride program reaches major milestone
item.description: As of Sept. 10, the program had provided more than 1,119 free rides.

item.title: Sandbag stations open in Sarasota County Sept. 14
item.description: The stations will be at three locations from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.

item.title: Bayflite medical helicopter now based at Venice Municipal Airport
item.description: “When lives are on the line, minutes matter,” Venice officials said.

item.title: Shooting reported in Newtown
item.description: The victim, an adult male driver, was found near First Street and Central Avenue.

item.title: Beach & Boating Forecast Saturday
item.description: Weekend winds will hold out of the North and Northeast at 10-15 mph both days

item.title: Walnut the sea turtle released after successful aquarium rehab
item.description: A very thin Walnut was found floating near Madeira Beach April 18.

item.title: Farmer’s Markets Saturday Forecast
item.description: Humidity is lower with dew points dropping into the 60s

item.title: Cortez public boat ramp stirs up community concerns
item.description: The community is concerned with increased traffic, limited space, and losing their restaurants.

item.title: Tourism numbers released by Visit Sarasota
item.description: Hotel room and vacation rental rates went up more than $20 on average.

item.title: Mostly Sunny and Mainly Dry
item.description: An isolated shower or thunderstorm is still possible in the heat of the afternoon
